level.text: The following routes are established for the DC Circulator:
Capitol Hill Loop – Union Station to points in the Capitol Hill neighborhood, which may include the Capitol South and Navy Yard Metro Stations;
East-West Loop – Union Station, Massachusetts Avenue, N.W., the Washington Convention Center, and Georgetown;
Georgetown Loop – which may include stops in Georgetown; Rosslyn, Virginia; Adams Morgan; Dupont Circle; and the U Street, N.W., corridor;
Monuments Loop – Monuments and museums on the National Mall;
North-South Loop – Mt. Vernon Square, 7th or 9th Street, NW, the National Mall, and Water Street, SW;
Smithsonian Loop – Constitution Avenue, 1st Street, NE, 1st Street, SE, Independence Avenue, and 17th Street; and
Woodley Park-Adams Morgan-Downtown loop – Woodley Park to Downtown, which may include points in Adams Morgan, Columbia Heights, and 14th Street, NW.
The routes established in § 1501.1 may operate seven (7) days a week between the hours of 5:00 a.m. and 3:30 a.m.
